msg.msgText:
A "QueueManagerConnection" composite object can be deleted using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete QueueManagerConnection help imaserver delete QueueManagerConnection "Name=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete QueueManagerConnection "Name=QMConn1"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
